title: Does making lot of dua in sujood, ruku require sujood as sahu, moving index finger between 2 Sujood?
transcript: he says if i were to make a lot of dua in sujud or does this require suture the saud answer is no if i added a movement of the finger not when doing tesha hud rather between the two prostrations when i'm sitting saying rabbi furly rubber furly i moved it unintentionally does it require the answers no even if you do it intentionally it doesn't require sujud asahu
